about_the_game:
RushOut is a crazy mix of platformers, third-person shooters, and puzzles. We’ve taken all your favorite features and cranked them up waaay beyond anything a human can handle. Absolutely everything, from the hostile C4-strapped pigs and zombie wizards to the burgers, pizzas, and lollipops that are used as traps, everything works towards the same goal—sending you back to the start of the level and making you cry.



Having been thrown into a boundless dream world full of weird platforms, devastating traps, and crazed enemies, you journey out on a quest to complete a deranged obstacle course, figure out who put you here, and make them regret every decision they ever made.



Utilize your over-the-top finesse and out-of-this-world puzzle-solving skills, as well as the outrageousness of the maps and your ragdoll to complete the levels with very deadly imprecision!



Collect increasingly powerful weapons to fight back the mindless enemies and their scheming leaders!



Use all the means at your disposal to solve puzzles that are designed to keep you from getting out, dodge traps, and try to escape as fast as possible!

RushOut is a crazy mix of platformers, third-person shooters, and puzzles. We’ve taken all your favorite features and cranked them up waaay beyond anything a human can handle. Absolutely everything, from the hostile C4-strapped pigs and zombie wizards to the burgers, pizzas, and lollipops that are used as traps, everything works towards the same goal—sending you back to the start of the level and making you cry.



Having been thrown into a boundless dream world full of weird platforms, devastating traps, and crazed enemies, you journey out on a quest to complete a deranged obstacle course, figure out who put you here, and make them regret every decision they ever made.



Utilize your over-the-top finesse and out-of-this-world puzzle-solving skills, as well as the outrageousness of the maps and your ragdoll to complete the levels with very deadly imprecision!



Collect increasingly powerful weapons to fight back the mindless enemies and their scheming leaders!



Use all the means at your disposal to solve puzzles that are designed to keep you from getting out, dodge traps, and try to escape as fast as possible!
name: RushOut

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit only
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit only
  • Processor: Intel i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 / AMD RX 5700
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: RushOut is a wacky ragdoll crash course that’s filled to the brim with addictive platforming puzzles, high-powered weapons, zombie wizards, and C4-strapped pigs. Sprint through exhilarating obstacles and shoot your way through hordes of goofy enemies all the way to victory!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
